channel.title: Services on Apoorv's Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Services on Apoorv's Portfolio

item.title: Corporate training
item.description: To keep up with your competition, you need your employees to be abreast with the cutting edge tools. With hands on trainings, I can help your employees learn and decide if a technology can give you the business edge.

item.title: Data Management
item.description: Data is the new oil. With my experience in building blazing fast, cloud scale and regulation compliant data platforms, make sure that your data is safe, secure and ready to serve the business at all times.

item.title: System Architecture
item.description: The corner stone of a successful business is a scalable and reliable tech infrastructure. Work with me to make sure your systems are ready to handle the 100x growth when your product succeeds.

item.title: Tech team strategies
item.description: With experience building teams at finance behemoths to startups, I can help you assess the right team combination for your goals before, during and after the hiring process to ensure timely product delivery.
